main_events: [Here’s how CNN projects elections]: Millions of Americans will be tuning in to CNN and other networks on election night as returns roll in. They’ll be waiting to see who wins, something CNN will determine with a series of projections.

[An hour-by-hour guide to election night poll closings]: The 2024 presidential election will decide control of the White House, Senate, House of Representatives, statewide offices and ballot measures on key issues in many states. This is a guide by poll-closing time for the notable races – both competitive and not – that are on the ballot. See race ratings for Senate and House by Inside Elections with Nathan L. Gonzales. Click on a state’s name to see results and projections for that state once votes start being counted.
